attributes.additional_details:
Kurdistan is the home for 4.5 million Kurdish people in the North of Iraq, they have achieved their semi independence since 1991 and they govern their territories successfully. Also they have good incomes of gas and oil as well as free trade. In addition, Kurdistan has a brilliant human write record and they try hard to become the best among the Middle East Countries.
Unfortunately, recently their sovereignty has been threatened by Iraqi army. Because Kurdistan suffered from different former Iraqi governments in the past (Anal genocide and Halabja tragedy ) and Kurdistan linked to Iraq obligatory as well as Kurdish people is a largest nationality in the world about 40 million people in (Turkey, Iran, Iraq and Syria) they have write to have at least their independent country in north of Iraq as Independent country (Kurdistan).
